hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # 6th of the month. Every other month. Jan Mar May Jul Sep Nov H H 6 1-12 *

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#cd /Library/WebServer/Documents/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
# php 368.php jenkins #OBSOLETE, use below instead.
# Six (6) connectors to run, one after the other - OK
php pbdb_fresh_harvest.php jenkins # - this generates 368.tar.gz
# This will adjust newly generated 368.tar.gz. # It'll remove all Aves descendants as requested. php remove_Aves_children_from_368.php jenkins # - this generates 368_removed_aves.tar.gz
# This will remove bad synonyms php synonyms_handling.php jenkins 368_final # - this generates 368_final.tar.gz
# 4th step: This will merge 2 occurrences into 1 php 368_merge_two_MoF_into_one.php # - this generates 368_merged_MoF.tar.gz
# 5the step: This will remove some MoF and put a lifeStage in occurrence php pbdb_more_adjustments.php # - this generates 368_cleaned_MoF.tar.gz
# 6th step: delta hashing php make_hash_IDs_4Deltas.php jenkins '{"task": "", "resource":"Deltas_4hashing", "resource_id":"368_cleaned_MoF"}' # - this generates 368_delta.tar.gz
